subject: Re: king plus font in open office
msgSnippet: What distro of Linux do you use? I use Ubuntu, and I got it working on my machine, but I don t know if the steps I used would work for other types of Linux.
messageBody:
What distro of Linux do you use? I use Ubuntu, and I got it working on
my machine, but I don't know if the steps I used would work for other
types of Linux.

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "peter_r_guinness" <malt99@...>
wrote:
>
> Can anyone get the king-plus font to work in open-office on linux. (It
> does work with every other text program that I run on linux, eg:
> KOffice).
>
